title: Reading Comprehension of Indonesian Narrative Texts Using Augmented Reality-Based Digital Storytelling

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Indonesian grammar and vocabulary comprehension, along with digital device usage experience
context.additional_context: Aims to improve narrative text analysis skills applicable to workplace tasks for current professionals

learning_goals: Learners can identify intrinsic elements (characters, events, settings) of Indonesian narrative texts with 80% accuracy via AR-based digital storytelling.
Learners can analyze the meaning of narrative texts using multimedia text-image integration and engage in discussions with over 70% participation.
Learners can apply narrative text reading strategies through formative assessments and write self-reflection reports based on feedback.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
